CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to recommend courses to groups
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to use existing user groups while making recommendations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to recommend courses to groups
OldVersion.description: Allows users to use existing user groups while making recommendations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Slash Commands
CurrentVersion.description: User will be able to type slash in Teams compose box and select a command, helping them complete their task quickly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management | Adaptive Protection - HR resignation date as a condition for risk level
CurrentVersion.description: ,Admins can now select the HR resignation date as a condition to assign a minor, moderate, or elevated risk level. For example, an admin can configure the minor risk level to be assigned when an HR resignation date is sent via the HR connector. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management | Adaptive Protection - HR resignation date as a condition for risk level
OldVersion.description: ,Admins can now select the HR resignation date as a condition to assign a minor, moderate, or elevated risk level. For example, an admin can configure the minor risk level to be assigned when an HR resignation date is sent via the HR connector. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Click Through Collaborative Annotations Layer
CurrentVersion.description: Users are now able to click through the annotation layer to interact with content in meetings without restarting the current annotation session.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Click Through Collaborative Annotations Layer
OldVersion.description: Users are now able to click through the annotation layer to interact with content in meetings without restarting the current annotation session. Note: We are postponing the rollout of this feature at this time, and it will only be available in the new Teams experience. We apologize for any inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
CurrentVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text. Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to the right information. Note: The release state and clouds now reflect the current status. Government clouds will release at a later date. We apologize for any inconveniences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
OldVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text. Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to the right information. Note: The release state now reflects the current status. We apologize for any inconveniences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Bookable desks
CurrentVersion.description: With the bookable desks feature in Teams, users can reserve desks upon arrival by plugging in to shared desks. IT admins can discover bookable desks in shared spaces in the Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management portal and collect utilization data from these desks for proactive management and planning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
CurrentVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Add Images to Check-In Notes and Review Dashboards
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, users can attach images to check-in notes and dashboards in Viva Goals to better illustrate their ideas visually.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Add Images to Check-In Notes and Review Dashboards
OldVersion.description: With this capability, users can attach images to check-in notes and dashboards in Viva Goals to better illustrate their ideas visually.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Integration into Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rolling out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. Viva Pulse provides a way for organizations to capture sentiment data that maps to work patterns data from Viva Insights to measure AI adoption.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Integration into Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
OldVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rolling out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. Viva Pulse provides a way for organizations to capture sentiment data that maps to work patterns data from Viva Insights to measure AI adoption.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
CurrentVersion.description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document rather than operating on the entire document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft Copilot assisted check-ins for Viva Goals
CurrentVersion.description: ,Unleash the potential of Copilot and effortlessly generate draft check-ins for your OKRs by synthesizing progress, status, and check-in details from associated child items tailored to your preferences through a selection of dynamic check-in templates.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft Copilot assisted check-ins for Viva Goals
OldVersion.description: ,Unleash the potential of Copilot and effortlessly generate draft check-ins for your OKRs by synthesizing progress, status, and check-in details from associated child items tailored to your preferences through a selection of dynamic check-in templates.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: New feature for silence removal (pauses) in Clipchamp
CurrentVersion.description: ,We think editing your video could be a quick job but isn't necessarily so sometimes. Silence removal uses AI auto transcription to transcribe your audio. We infer pauses in your speech transcription and any gaps in the speech we detected for more than 3 seconds is considered a pause. We provide you with the option to remove all pauses at once with a single click or to review each pause where you can adjust and consider ones you want to keep.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Clipchamp: New feature for silence removal (pauses) in Clipchamp
OldVersion.description: ,We think editing your video could be a quick job but isn't necessarily so sometimes. Silence removal uses AI auto transcription to transcribe your audio. We infer pauses in your speech transcription and any gaps in the speech we detected for more than 3 seconds is considered a pause. We provide you with the option to remove all pauses at once with a single click or to review each pause where you can adjust and consider ones you want to keep.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Enhancements to the DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: Mac DLP will have the following capabilities with these enhancements: Context Based Classification and Matched condition and short evidence for advanced classification.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts on local files when using Copilot with Graph-grounded chat
CurrentVersion.description: Ground prompts on local files when using Copilot with Graph-grounded chat by clicking "Upload" in the ContextIQ interface.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Change history reports
CurrentVersion.description: Create custom reports to monitor changes made to the SharePoint configuration across various levels of your organization. Review CSV reports of site actions or organization setting changes made within the last 180 days.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Ability to recommend courses to groups
CurrentVersion.description: Allows users to use existing user groups while making recommendations.
